attributes.action: SPEED UP THE ANNOUNCEMENTS OF CLOSURE FOR POST OFFICES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a sub postmaster i am appealing to the government and Post Office Ltd to speed up the closures, i now have a life of limbo on the edge of bankruptcy waiting to know if we are closing. we will not find out until next June. If the post offices are going to close then DO IT QUICKLY. STOP THE TORTURE OF SUB POSTMASTERS

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
